Darwin’s supporters remained undaunted, continuing to spread the theory of evolution.

Huxley even coined a new word to describe Darwin’s theory of evolution, “Darwinism”.

In 1862. Darwin published the paper On the Various Contrivances By Which British and Foreign Orchids Are Fertilised By Insects.

It’s about how

flowers have evolved in particular

to attract insects.

This thory has the power to change the world. It's only right that it be called "Darwinism"
